title: Episode 303: Vibrant India
description: This week on ﻿Eat Your Words﻿, host Cathy Erway is joined in the studio by Chitra Agrawal, the author of Vibrant India: Fresh Vegetarian Recipes from Bangalore to Brooklyn, and the founder of Brooklyn Delhi, an award-winning Indian condiments line. Chitra writes the popular recipe blog The ABCDs of Cooking, teaches vegetarian Indian cooking classes at Brooklyn Kitchen, Brooklyn Brainery, and Whole Foods, and hosts pop-up dinners throughout New York City with creative Indian-inspired menus.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
